name: Super Grapple Duck
description:
Get as many points as you can by performing tricks and combos with your grappling hook!

Killing enemies gives you more time. Touching enemies reduces time.

Slice enemies with your grappling hook while managing your time/health. Knock spike bombs with the grapple and turn them into friendly grenades while zipping around.

Done in 48 hours as part of the GMTK Game Jam: https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-jam

Controls

[ A + D ]: Move

[ Left Click ]: Fire  Grapple/Fling/Cancel Grapple

[ Right Click ]: Cancel  Grapple

As always, the downloadable EXE performs better, featuring more satisfying sounds and a nicer death animation.
